Summary How to use snipper

= Installation =


 * You need vim with python enabled to use this script (python 2.4 should be enough)
 * Unpack snipper-0.2.tar.gz to some dir (for example ~/bin/snipper)
 * link ~/.vim/snipper to ~/bin/snipper:
 ln -s ~/bin/snipper ~/.vim/snipper
 * add this to your ~/.vimrc:
 autocmd VimEnter * source ~/.vim/snipper/snipper.vim

If you want to change the keybindings for snipper change them in ~/.vim/snipper/snipper.vim

= Use =
enter a defined template and press tab
check the small introduction video (2mb): http://snipper.googlecode.com/files/snipper-0.1-example.ogg
